prompt:
Meeting transcript:
{transcript_chunk}
Provide a full summary of the meeting based on the meeting transcript.
Do not include tasks separately.
prompt_concatenate:
Here are parts of a summary of a work meeting:
{gpt_responses}
Combine them to provide a complete and coherent summary.
It must include all the information from the parts above. Remove repetitions if necessary.
goals: Summarizes meeting transcripts to provide a detailed overview of what was discussed.
